Name: Strike Solitaire 2
About the game: The sea, the sun, and solitaire! Hit a strike on the seashore! This is solitaire in a unique country bowling-hotel setting, allowing you to play two games at once – bowling and solitaire. 120 new levels will give you several hours of entertaining game-play, and the presence of unique gold card-pins will add variety to the game mechanics you're used to. A game in the solitaire genre A card pair selection mechanic 120 levels of varying difficulty Two games combined – solitaire and bowling A unique setting of country bowling-hotels
